name: part_006
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Natsuiro Matsuri performing the song 'Phony' on stage.
Transition between songs with applause and stage resetting.
Tokoyami Towa and Natsuiro Matsuri performing the song 'Dry Flower' on stage.

subtitles.original: 愛帯 逢いたい 逢いたい その笑顔に
subtitles.english: I want to see, I want to see, I want to see that smile.

subtitles.original: 愛帯 逢いたい 逢いたいと言えば 笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: If I say I want to see you, I wonder if you'll smile for me.

subtitles.original: 取り殺させるくらいはいいじゃない
subtitles.english: Being haunted to death sounds fine, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 欲を言えばこの手で咲かせてみせたい
subtitles.english: If I'm being greedy, I want to make it bloom with these hands.

subtitles.original: 病のように
subtitles.english: Like a sickness.

subtitles.original: 心は喰らう花
subtitles.english: The heart is a devouring flower.

subtitles.original: 枯らしたないのさ
subtitles.english: I don't want to let it wither.

subtitles.original: 光が届かずとも
subtitles.english: Even if the light doesn't reach,

subtitles.original: 水をあげ続けるから
subtitles.english: I'll keep giving it water.

subtitles.original: いい加減に気付いて
subtitles.english: Realize it already,

subtitles.original: 君は素敵って
subtitles.english: that you are wonderful.

subtitles.original: 自惚れてもっとお大事に
subtitles.english: Be more conceited, take care of yourself.

subtitles.original: 無自覚なまま愛を蓄えて
subtitles.english: Accumulating love while remaining unaware,

subtitles.original: 綺麗にされた花瓶も
subtitles.english: even the cleaned vase,

subtitles.original: 肥やしもなにもいらない
subtitles.english: doesn't need fertilizer or anything.

subtitles.original: その姿で咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Bloom proudly in that form.

subtitles.original: 花になって
subtitles.english: Become a flower.

subtitles.original: ほらニヒルに笑って その顔に
subtitles.english: Look, laugh cynically, at that face.

subtitles.original: ぞくぞくして目が離せない
subtitles.english: I'm shivering and can't look away.

subtitles.original: 味見して 君の毒は私の薬って
subtitles.english: Taste it, your poison is my medicine.

subtitles.original: 包んであげるから
subtitles.english: I'll wrap you up in it.

subtitles.original: 楽にして 君の闇は私の光って
subtitles.english: Relax, your darkness is my light.

subtitles.original: 愛してあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll love you.

subtitles.original: 笑って
subtitles.english: Smile.

subtitles.original: 多分 私じゃなくていいね
subtitles.english: Probably, it doesn't have to be me.

subtitles.original: 余裕のない二人だったし
subtitles.english: We were two people with no room to spare.

subtitles.original: 気付けば喧嘩ばっかりしてさ ごめんね
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, we were just fighting. I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: ずっと話そうと思ってた
subtitles.english: I've been meaning to talk for a while.

subtitles.original: きっと私たち合わないね
subtitles.english: We probably just don't match.

subtitles.original: 二人きりしかいない部屋でさ
subtitles.english: In a room with just the two of us,

subtitles.original: 貴方ばっかり話していたよね
subtitles.english: you were the only one talking, weren't you?

subtitles.original: もしいつか何処かで会えたら
subtitles.english: If we happen to meet somewhere again someday,

subtitles.original: 今日の事を笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you'll laugh about today.

subtitles.original: 理由もちゃんと話せないけれど
subtitles.english: I can't really explain the reason properly, but

subtitles.original: 貴方が眠った後に泣くのは嫌
subtitles.english: I hate crying after you've fallen asleep.

subtitles.original: 声も顔も不器用なとこも
subtitles.english: Your voice, your face, even your clumsiness,

subtitles.original: 全部全部 嫌いじゃないの
subtitles.english: I don't hate any of it, none of it.

subtitles.original: ドライフラワーみたい
subtitles.english: Like a dry flower,

subtitles.original: 君との日々も きっときっときっときっと
subtitles.english: my days with you will surely, surely, surely, surely...

subtitles.original: 色褪せる
subtitles.english: fade in color.

subtitles.original: 多分 君じゃなくてよかった
subtitles.english: Maybe I'm glad it wasn't you.

subtitles.original: もう泣かされることもないし
subtitles.english: I won't be made to cry anymore,

subtitles.original: 「私ばかり」なんて言葉もなくなった
subtitles.english: and the phrase 'It's always just me' has disappeared.

subtitles.original: あんなに悲しい別れでも
subtitles.english: Even with such a sad parting,

subtitles.original: 時間が経てば忘れてく
subtitles.english: I'll forget it as time goes by.

subtitles.original: 新しい人と並ぶ君は
subtitles.english: You, standing next to someone new,

subtitles.original: ちゃんとうまくやれているのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're getting along well.

subtitles.original: もう顔も
subtitles.english: Even your face,

subtitles.original: 見たくないからさ
subtitles.english: I don't want to see it anymore.

subtitles.original: 変に連絡してこないでほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to stop contacting me unexpectedly.

subtitles.original: 都合がいいのは変わってないんだね
subtitles.english: You haven't changed how selfish you are, have you?

subtitles.original: でも無視できずにまた少し返事
subtitles.english: But I can't ignore you, so I reply a little again.

subtitles.original: 声も顔も不器用なとこも
subtitles.english: Your voice, your face, even your clumsiness,

subtitles.original: 多分 今も 嫌いじゃないの
subtitles.english: Maybe, even now, I don't hate them.
